summary: Implements a wrapper around the HuggingFace Stable Diffusion pipeline to serve as a guidance module for Neural Radiance Field (NeRF) training. The class handles model loading, precision configuration, image encoding, text embedding extraction, and executes diffusion‑based training steps using a DDIM scheduler.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use diffusion‑based guidance component that enhances 3D scene reconstruction and NeRF model quality through text‑to‑image generation, supporting research, product development, and commercial applications in multimodal AI and generative graphics.
